column1: Blockchain in Business and Society MSc
column5: The penetration of artificial intelligence and information technologies into business solutions, accelerates business innovation processes. Blockchain technology has twisted the role and place of a socio-economic interaction. This programme provides students with the deep knowledge and insight into the use and application of blockchain technology for new business processes and strategies.
